All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AccelerationSystem
Accelerates entities by force.
ActionQueue
A collection of queued actions to apply to containing entities.
ActionResourceConverterFactory
ResourceConverterFactory for core actions.
ActionSystem
Dequeues and applies actions on entities.
Bounds
A closed boundary.
CappingSystem
Caps velocities of entities.
Chain
Maintains references to a single positional and multiple rotational anchors.
ChainSystem
Repositions chained entities.
Chase
An intended position and maximum strength used to reach that position.
ChaseSystem
Alters an entity's force to move its position towards its chased target's position.
Collidable
A marker indicating that the owning entity can respond to collisions.
CollisionSystem
Simmulates collisions for Collidable Intersected entities.
Correctable
A marker indicating that the owning entity can respond to boundary intersections.
CorrectionSystem
Repositions Correctable Intersected entities just enough to remove the immediate intersection.
Damping
Damping applied on an entity.
DampingSystem
Applies damping to entity velocities.
Force
Net force acting on an entity.
ForceAction
Adds an amount to an entity's existing force component.
Intersected
Notes that an intersection between entities occurred.
IntersectionSystem
Detects entity intersections.
Mass
Mass of an entity.
MovementSystem
Applies velocity to entity positions.
Orientation
Facing of an entity in space.
OrientationAction
Sets an orientation.
PhysicsCleanupSystem
Removes physics-related event components.
Position
Placement of an entity in space.
PositionAction
Sets a position.
Spawner
Provides clones of entity templates between 2 radii around some position.
SpawnSystem
Spawns entity clones from spawner entities.
Velocity
Velocity of a moving entity.
VelocityAction
Sets entity velocity.
VelocityCap
Maximum velocity of a moving entity.
